description: Avoid ragi/ white bread/ jowar
Eat frequent meals with 2-3 hours of gap
Add vit B12 rich food in diet
Monitor HBA1C , kidney test after 3 months
Less Salt
Do not sprinkle salt
Avoid high Glycemic index foods like ragi/ white bread/ white rice
If you have taken hormonal theraphy in past, please reduce the fat intake
Avoid soy, brocolli, cabbage and all cruciferous food
Avoid soy contain breads (white or brown). Please check bread ingredients
Avoid taking antacids with thyroid medicines
Monitor thyroid profile after every 3 months
Add vitamin B12 rich food in diet
Get your iron and vitamin B12 test done after every 6 months
Avoid gluten for lifetime
Say no to milk and milk products but can take curd/ paneer
Get your iron and vitamin B12 tests done after every 6 months
Increase intake of water/ fluids
Stop retention of stool or avoid painful evacuation of stool
Increase fiber intake
